testcase.name: User browse site for product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to Vodafone shop site...................................passed And Select language as English..............................................passed And move to Brand section and select Iphone.................................passed When Select any of returned iphone mobiles..................................passed And Press add to cart.......................................................passed And Press Proceed to Checkout...............................................passed And Select Delivery Options as Cairo Ain Shams..............................passed And Select Deliver to My Address............................................passed And Add address details.....................................................passed And confirm shipping address................................................passed And Leave Personal info Tab empty...........................................passed And confirm personal info...................................................passed Then an error message returned from Full Name field.........................passed
